FRESHLY MINTED
What is this, anyway?

Land Ahoy!

This is Herring Cove, a minimal theme built for Jekyll. It features a number distinctive features such as a fixed sidebar and a showcase image. It's also easily configurable and editable to your liking.

On this test site, you will find some blog posts, interesting links, and more. You'll also find a number of ways to get in touch.

Herring Cove

  42°2'16"N 70°12'47"W

 rnpatel[at]me.com

Hi, I'm Herring Cove, a theme for Jekyll from Massachusetts. You may also know me as a beach on Cape Cod.
